name: SpaceCraft RTS
description:
SpaceCraft is a real-time strategy (RTS) placed in sci-fi world in which you control an army 1 of 3 races (added in updates) in the battle for domination on different planets.

Game features:
- low poly graphic
- 3 basic materials
- playable workers
- 4 varied types of battle units
- 5 type of buildings
- 3 challenging difficulty levels
- fog of war
- interesting story
- addictive gameplay

This isn't a full version of the story. Its continuation will be added in updates. If you have any question or you had found some bugs send us an e-mail or message on our facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/VOXEL-FUN-101939163513813/?ref=hl
